metadata.title: CVE-2014-3563 on Ubuntu 14.04 LTS (trusty) - low
metadata.description: Multiple unspecified vulnerabilities in Salt (aka SaltStack) before2014.1.10 allow local users to have an unspecified impact via vectorsrelated to temporary file creation in (1) seed.py, (2) salt-ssh, or (3)salt-cloud.

criterions.comment: salt: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support').
